channel.title: Help me pls?... How do i edit the stuff if i'm using winrar?
channel.description:
Pls someone help me how do i edit files etc if i'm using winrar becauseif i right click on the file it doesnt say edit??
Pls someone help =[ plus i have an error...
when i click runserver it comes up with this
Exception in thread 'main' Java.NoClassdeffoundError: server
can someone tell me whats wrong with it?

item.title: Help me pls?... How do i edit the stuff if i'm using winrar?
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

[quote=“jehanne, post:4, topic:62114”][quote author=Sonical link=topic=89617.msg944684#msg944684 date=1172524109]
Pls someone help me how do i edit files etc if i’m using winrar becauseif i right click on the file it doesnt say edit??

Pls someone help =[ plus i have an error…

when i click runserver it comes up with this

Exception in thread ‘main’ Java.NoClassdeffoundError: server

can someone tell me whats wrong with it?
[/quote]

i know whats wrong. u have to decompile the file first. AFTER that use compile.bat[/quote]

I think you mean compile

Read full topic

item.title: Help me pls?... How do i edit the stuff if i'm using winrar?
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

YEs i no what that is 1 minute and i wil have something for you[br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2007, 10:11:50 AM[/size][hr]right click on compile and delete everything you see then paste:

@echo off COLOR 07 title KingdomScape Is Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java title KingdomScape Is Compiled! pause

And then right click on runserver and delete everything you see and paste this:

@echo off COLOR 04 title KingdomScape Is Running! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin/java.exe" server pause

Thanks…

Read full topic
